newsitem.title: NIGERIA: Nigeria's UBA bank full year profits fall.
newsitem.headline: Nigeria's UBA bank full year profits fall.

text.p: Full year results for Nigeria's United Bank for Africa to end-March 1997 released on Wednesday. (In million naira unless stated)
Dividend per share 10 kobo vs 33 kobo
NOTE: The company announced a bonus issue of two shares for every three held. -- Lagos newsroom +234 1 263 03 17
